languages.text: {n}Сверток с инструментами исчезает.{/n} "Мне приятно, что ты принимаешь на веру мои слова".
{n}The pouch vanishes as quickly as it appeared.{/n} "You honour me by taking me at my word."

languages.text: {n}El estuche desaparece tan rápidamente como apareció.{/n} «Me honra aceptando mi palabra».
languages.original_text: {n}The pouch vanishes as quickly as it appeared.{/n} "You honour me by taking me at my word."

traits.locale_text: {n}El estuche desaparece tan rápidamente como apareció.{/n} «Me honra aceptando mi palabra».

languages.text: {n}ポーチは現れた時と同じ速さで消える。{/n}「あなたは私の言葉を受け入れることで、私への敬意を表している」
languages.original_text: {n}The pouch vanishes as quickly as it appeared.{/n} "You honour me by taking me at my word."

traits.locale_text: {n}ポーチは現れた時と同じ速さで消える。{/n}「あなたは私の言葉を受け入れることで、私への敬意を表している」

languages.text: {n}皮袋转瞬之间就消失不见了。{/n}“你愿意相信我的话，这是我的荣幸。”
languages.original_text: {n}The pouch vanishes as quickly as it appeared.{/n} "You honour me by taking me at my word."

traits.locale_text: {n}皮袋转瞬之间就消失不见了。{/n}“你愿意相信我的话，这是我的荣幸。”

languages.text: {n}Der Beutel verschwindet ebenso schnell, wie er erschienen ist.{/n} "Ihr ehrt mich, indem Ihr mich beim Wort nehmt."
languages.original_text: {n}The pouch vanishes as quickly as it appeared.{/n} "You honour me by taking me at my word."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Beutel verschwindet ebenso schnell, wie er erschienen ist.{/n} "Ihr ehrt mich, indem Ihr mich beim Wort nehmt."

languages.text: {n}La bourse disparaît aussi vite qu'elle est apparue.{/n} « Vous me faites un grand honneur en me prenant au mot. »
languages.original_text: {n}The pouch vanishes as quickly as it appeared.{/n} "You honour me by taking me at my word."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, keseyi çıkardığı gibi hızla kaldırıyor.{/n} "Sözüme güvenerek bana şeref vermiş oldun."
